channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My father is giving me $250K to buy a home, but told me not to tell my two siblings. Am I morally obligated to tell them?
item.description: “I don’t want to jeopardize my father’s kind offer.”

item.title: Stellantis and Mercedes-Benz withdraw guidance as VW says it can’t quantify tariff hit
item.description: Chrysler owner Stellantis and Mercedes-Benz withdrew their guidance for the year while Volkswagen said it was expecting profits at the low end of a pr...

item.title: Kiss rocker Gene Simmons lists $14 million Beverly Hills mansion—with a strict buyer selection process
item.description: Simmons is excluding potential buyers he believes will soil the happy memories he and his family have made in the home.

item.title: My boyfriend owns a house and earns more than me, but I refuse to marry him without a prenup. Is that wise?
item.description: “I recently learned about land that has been in my family for 150 years.”

item.title: Former ‘19 Kids and Counting’ star Jim Bob Duggar buys $1 milllion Arkansas property
item.description: Did the father of 19 buy the house for his daughter-in-law, whose husband is in prison?

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
